bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition of festering chuang 瘡 , sores, conditions developing in the genital region and in the crevices between the legs and the genital/anal region. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry fan shi 礬石 quotes Jiu ji liang fang 救急良方 : 魚口瘡毒：白礬枯研，寒食麵糊調 , 傅上，即消 , “For fish mouth sores poison : Grind dried bai fan and mix with a paste made from Cold Dish [Festival] dough. Apply externally and [the sores poison] will disappear”.
